# Chapter 8: Geoprocessing Tools in GIS

## Learning Objectives

After studying this chapter you should be able to:

-   Understand the different geoprocessing tools in GIS
-   Use geoprocessing tools in QGIS:
    -   Dissolve
    -   Buffer
    -   Clip
    -   Union
    -   Intersection
    -   Difference
    -   Split
